meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of industry
meanings.sent1: The factory workers wore indusial uniforms.
meanings.sent2: The company implemented new indusial practices to increase efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The robot made an indusial mistake by assembling the parts incorrectly.
meanings.sent4: Her work ethic was as indusial as a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The sound of machinery in the factory created an indusial atmosphere.

meanings.definition: of or relating to the Indus River
meanings.sent1: The ancient civilization thrived along the indusial banks of the river.
meanings.sent2: The indusial region experienced frequent flooding during the monsoon season.
meanings.sent3: The boat ride along the indusial waters was peaceful and serene.
meanings.sent4: The indusial landscape was dotted with lush greenery along the riverbanks.
meanings.sent5: The indusial culture of the region was rich in history and tradition.

meanings.definition: a protective covering or structure, such as a shell or casing
meanings.sent1: The turtle retreated into its indusial shell when threatened.
meanings.sent2: The spacecraft had a sturdy indusial design to withstand the harsh conditions of space.
meanings.sent3: The knight's armor gleamed under the indusial light of the setting sun.
meanings.sent4: The seed was encased in an indusial coating for protection during germination.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar spun an indusial cocoon around itself before transforming into a butterfly.
